option.od: print the help message and exits.
uses the PSR10 statistical model (equivalent to the RG05 model.)
Do not interpolate coeffiecients, instead use discrete models.
Do not use IGRF model to convert potential to velocities,
uses the older AACGM software and coefficients. The default

synopsis.p: Calculates the statistical model and writes it to standard output.

description.p: Calculates the statistical model and writes it to standard output.

example.description: Calculates TS18 model vectors and potential on a uniform grid for input solar wind and dipole tilt parameters. The output is written to the file "model.txt".
